l: Do you play Minecraft pocket edition? Do you want to use Onix Cient in MCPE but don't have a windows 10 computer?
p: Well, you came at the right place. A guy in Onix Client discord server secretly stole latest available Onix Client MCPE beta and posted it here. Now you can show of Onix Client in MCPE 😎😎🤯🤯🤯
Go into settings >Resource packs> then enable Onix Client MCPE resource pack
It has Onix Client GUI built in 😎
